job_description:
Company: FullStack Inc
Position: Software Engineer (Full Stack)
Location: Atlanta, GA (Remote)
Salary: $110,000 - $150,000

About Us:
FullStack Inc provides comprehensive software solutions. We are a team of talented full-stack developers. We strive to deliver high quality solutions to our customers.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Full Stack Software Engineer. The ideal candidate will have experience in both front-end and back-end technologies. You will be proficient with common frameworks and have experience building microservices.

Responsibilities:
- Develop both front-end and back-end components of web applications.
- Work with product managers to design and implement new features.
- Maintain software and troubleshoot customer issues.
- Participate in code review and improve development processes.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
- 3+ years of experience in software development.
- Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and a back-end language (e.g., Node.js, Python, Java).
- Experience with databases (e.g., SQL, MongoDB).

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with React, Angular, or Vue.js.
- Knowledge of cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
- Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunity to work on varied projects.
- Remote work environment.
- Professional development opportunities.
